TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit KeyReference extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference
Public NotInheritable Class KeyReference Inherits EncryptedReference

summary.span: 表示用於 XML 加密的 項目。

span.span: Represents the element used in XML encryption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表``項目，其中包含已加密的金鑰位置相關資訊。The class represents the `` element that contains information about the location of an encrypted key. 使用``項目來參考``加密使用封入中所定義的索引鍵的項目``項目。Use the `` element to refer to `` elements that were encrypted using the key defined in the enclosing `` element. 您可以使用多個``項目時多個``元素存在，使用相同的金鑰進行加密。You can use multiple `` elements when multiple `` elements exist that are encrypted using the same key. 您可以包含其他資訊，例如 XPath 轉換、 解壓縮轉換或如何從文件的儲存體設備，以協助解密的應用程式擷取的項目資訊。You can include additional information such as XPath transforms, decompression transforms, or information about how to retrieve the elements from a document storage facility to aid the decrypting application. 如需 XML 加密標準的詳細資訊，請參閱 XML 加密規格，可在全球資訊網協會 (W3C) 從http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。For more information about XML encryption standards, see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用時加密 XML 文件的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object while encrypting an XML document. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Keyreference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Keyreference/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Keyreference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Keyreference/vb/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式建立的新執行個體表示類別``項目，使用提供的統一資源識別元 (URI) 和轉換鏈結。This constructor creates a new instance of the class that represents the `` element, using the supplied Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) and transform chain. URI 表示加密的金鑰和轉換鏈結可包含 XPath 轉換、 解壓縮轉換或有關如何擷取加密的資料的文件儲存設備的位置。The URI indicates the location of the encrypted key and the transform chain that can contain XPath transforms, decompression transforms, or information on how to retrieve the encrypted data from a document storage facility. `` 項目是 `` 項目的子項目。The `` element is a child element of the `` element. 如需 XML 加密標準的詳細資訊，請參閱 XML 加密規格，可在全球資訊網協會 (W3C) 從http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。For more information about XML encryption standards, see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
